Tender Title: Supply and Delivery of Electronic Security Equipment
Tender Description: Leeds City Council proposes to enter into a framework agreement for the Supply and Delivery of Electronic Security Equipment including CCTV, video recorders, intruder alarm systems, door access systems. This is a supply only contract; no installation services are required.
Classification Description: Security, fire-fighting, police and defence equipment

Tender Title: Leeds Relational Practice Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS)
Tender Description:
The Leeds City Council Relational Practice Centre (LRPC) works with local authorities across England to share our restorative practice based organisational development, social work practice and improvement strategies. The Centre is currently being funded by central government through their Strengthening Families Protecting Children (SFPC) programme to deliver this work, in addition to individual agreements with local authorities who want to learn more about our improvement journey. The Council is seeking to appoint independent consultants, predominantly social work professionals, to work with the LRPC lead to review working practices within these local authorities to develop and support improvement programmes using the successful Leeds approach to innovation and service design. 

A Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) will provide the Council with a pool of suitably qualified and experienced consultants to work with the Programme Director to deliver a programme or package of organisational review / practice improvement with around 5-10 local authorities per year through the SFPC programme, and 3-6 other local authorities who are not part of the SFPC but contract with Leeds City Council for service improvement support.  The deadline for initial submissions to join the DPS is 12 noon on Monday 17th August 2020, following the initial deadline the DPS will then be open to applicants for the full duration.
Classification Description: Business and management consultancy and related services
